data.actual_result: It gives the attached message, saying you can't deny the permission because you will lose it.
data.expected_result: It gives you a message saying you can't grant a permission you don't have, or it actually grants the permission
data.short_description: When granting a permission you don't have, it will give you a message saying you can't deny the permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Pick a server which you are missing a permission, such as Send Messages - Click Edit Channel (the gear) - Go to the Permissions section - For any role, click the check (attached) next to the permission you don't have.
